frameDefinitions: An Individual belongs to a  group that is categorized in terms of the political views on particular issues that the members of the group  tend to share, in opposition to other groups that hold different beliefs on the issues.
An Experiencer is in a State where a biological urge is signaling the need to perform a certain action such as eating, drinking, stopping exertion, sleeping, regurgitating, or having sex.
An Agent is described as pursuing an Activity, expending some effort.
A Person takes leave from his or her routine Activity (such as work or school) for a Duration of time.
A Student enrolls and then remains at an Institution for the purposes of education within a Subject.
This frame concerns people being in an altered mental state that is induced by an Intoxicant.
frameExamples: Sky, a Korean War veteran, was <t>active</t> in his opposition to Vietnam and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.
The claimant should then submit medical certificates for the duration of their <t>absence</t> from work.INI
He spent ten years <t>studying</t> physics at the lycee before he flunked out.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Individual</fen> who is referred to in terms of their place along the political spectrum.
The location in which the <fen>Individual</fen> resides.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> receives the biological signal and possesses the internal experience which is a reaction to the phsyical signal.
<fen>Expressor</fen> is used for a gesture, expression, or body part indicating that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is feeling a certain urge.
<fen>State</fen> identifies the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s state of being.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels the biological signal. <fen>Time</fen> may also allow inference about the <fen>Reason</fen> for the biological urge.
This role identifies the  <fen>Place</fen> is where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> feels the biological signal.
This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
This role identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the  <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
The person who is absent from his or her <fen>Activity</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen> of time.
This role describes the activity or responsiblilities from which the <fen>Person</fen> is taking a temporary leave.
The amount of time the <fen>Person</fen> is absent from his or her <fen>Activity</fen>.  This can also be expressed as a description of a duration, as shown below:
The time at which the leave occurs.
One who instructs a <fen>Student</fen> in some area of knowledge or skill.
One who receives instruction from a <fen>Teacher</fen> or <fen>Institution</fen>.
An educational establishment, such as a school or college.
The area of knowledge or skill which is taught  to a <fen>Student</fen>.
The time when the student is studying.

The <fen>Place</fen> is the location within which the studying takes place.

NOTE: Consider whether a possible <fen>Place</fen> phrase is really where the training took place or is rather part of a description of the <fen>Institution</fen>.
The mental state of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is changed by an <fen>Intoxicant</fen> .
The <fen>Intoxicant</fen> alters the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s mental experience.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> becomes intoxicated.
listRoleExamples: We need to reshape the agenda of the left <fex>in Hungary</fex>.
He gave me a tired <fex>shrug</fex> and then looked down again.
She was alarmed by John's hungry <fex>state</fex>.
He is always active <fex>demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.
<fex>He</fex> was active for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.
<fex>As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were active across the board.
Jacques Fuller has been active <fex>as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.
Commercial selling was active <fex>yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.
He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is active <fex>at the YMCA</fex>.
During his <fex>wife's</fex> absence, Linkworth and his mother had another violent argument.
Such conditions would be likely to lead to absence <fex>from work</fex>.
Dissuaded from resigning, Macmillan took <fex>extended</fex> leave rather than restrain his public utterances.
Columbus took leave of the known world <fex>on 6 September 1492</fex>.
